verses.verse: And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, But, behold, they will not <S%H539>believe<s%> me, nor <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto my <S%H6963>voice<s%>: for they will <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath not <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto thee.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, What is that in thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, A <S%H4294>rod<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7993>Cast<s%> it on the <S%H776>ground<s%>. And he <S%H7993>cast<s%> it on the <S%H776>ground<s%>, and it became a <S%H5175>serpent<s%>; and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> it.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Put <S%H7971>forth<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H270>take<s%> it by the <S%H2180>tail<s%>. And he put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H2388>caught<s%> it, and it became a <S%H4294>rod<s%> in his <S%H3709>hand<s%>:

That they may <S%H539>believe<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, hath <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto thee.

¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5750>furthermore<s%> unto him, <S%H935>Put<s%> now thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> into thy <S%H2436>bosom<s%>. And he <S%H935>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> into his <S%H2436>bosom<s%>: and when he <S%H3318>took<s%> it out, behold, his <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H6879>leprous<s%> as <S%H7950>snow<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7725>Put<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> into thy <S%H2436>bosom<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>. And he <S%H7725>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> into his <S%H2436>bosom<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>; and <S%H3318>plucked<s%> it out of his <S%H2436>bosom<s%>, and, behold, it was turned <S%H7725>again<s%> as his other <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.

And it shall come to pass, if they will not <S%H539>believe<s%> thee, neither <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H226>sign<s%>, that they will <S%H539>believe<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H314>latter<s%> <S%H226>sign<s%>.

And it shall come to pass, if they will not <S%H539>believe<s%> also these <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%>, neither <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto thy <S%H6963>voice<s%>, that thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H2975>river<s%>, and <S%H8210>pour<s%> it upon the <S%H3004>dry<s%> land: and the <S%H4325>water<s%> which thou <S%H3947>takest<s%> out of the <S%H2975>river<s%> shall become <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H3006>dry<s%> land.

¶ And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H994>O<s%> my <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H376>I<s%> am not <S%H1697>eloquent<s%>, neither <S%H8032%H8543>heretofore<s%>, nor <S%H227>since<s%> thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>: but I am <S%H3515>slow<s%> of <S%H6310>speech<s%>, and of a <S%H3515>slow<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Who hath <S%H7760>made<s%> <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%>? or who <S%H7760>maketh<s%> the <S%H483>dumb<s%>, or <S%H2795>deaf<s%>, or the <S%H6493>seeing<s%>, or the <S%H5787>blind<s%>? have not I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>?
Now therefore <S%H3212>go<s%>, and I will be with thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H3384>teach<s%> thee what thou shalt <S%H1696>say<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H994>O<s%> my <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H7971>send<s%>, I pray thee, by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of him whom thou wilt <S%H7971>send<s%>.

And the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Is not <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%>? I <S%H3045>know<s%> that he can <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H1696>well<s%>. And also, behold, he cometh <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> thee: and when he <S%H7200>seeth<s%> thee, he will be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto him, and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: and I will be with thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and with his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and will <S%H3384>teach<s%> you what ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%>.

And he shall be thy <S%H1696>spokesman<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>: and he shall be, even he shall be to thee instead of a <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and thou shalt be to him instead of <S%H430>God<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> this <S%H4294>rod<s%> in thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, wherewith thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%>.

¶ And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3500>Jethro<s%> his father in <S%H2859>law<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Let me <S%H3212>go<s%>, I pray thee, and <S%H7725>return<s%> unto my <S%H251>brethren<s%> which are in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> whether they be <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%>. And <S%H3503>Jethro<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H7725>return<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: for all the <S%H582>men<s%> are <S%H4191>dead<s%> which <S%H1245>sought<s%> thy <S%H5315>life<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H7392>set<s%> them upon an <S%H2543>ass<s%>, and he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, When thou <S%H3212>goest<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, <S%H7200>see<s%> that thou <S%H6213>do<s%> all those <S%H4159>wonders<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, which I have <S%H7760>put<s%> in thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>: but I will <S%H2388>harden<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, that he shall not let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is my <S%H1121>son<s%>, even my <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>:

And I <S%H559>say<s%> unto thee, Let my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>, that he may <S%H5647>serve<s%> me: and if thou <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to let him <S%H7971>go<s%>, behold, I will <S%H2026>slay<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, even thy <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>.
¶ And it came to pass by the <S%H1870>way<s%> in the <S%H4411>inn<s%>, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6298>met<s%> him, and <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> him.

Then <S%H6855>Zipporah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a sharp <S%H6864>stone<s%>, and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> of her <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H5060>cast<s%> it at his <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Surely a <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H2860>husband<s%> art thou to me.
So he let him <S%H7503>go<s%>: then she <S%H559>said<s%>, A <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H2860>husband<s%> thou art, because of the <S%H4139>circumcision<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>. And he <S%H3212>went<s%>, and <S%H6298>met<s%> him in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> who had <S%H7971>sent<s%> him, and all the <S%H226>signs<s%> which he had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him.
¶ And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and gathered <S%H622>together<s%> all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H226>signs<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H539>believed<s%>: and when they <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6485>visited<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and that he had <S%H7200>looked<s%> upon their <S%H6040>affliction<s%>, then they bowed their <S%H6915>heads<s%> and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%>.
